snippet.title: Best Forklift Operator | Do you know how to drive? [Trailer 2]
snippet.description:
STEAM | Add to wishlist: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1684670/

Best Forklift Operator is the first so polished and detailed game in which you can feel like driving a forklift. Increase your skills, and prove yourself to be the best in career, training & free roam mode. 
For gamers looking for even more interesting challenges, there is also a unique arcade mode! 

If you use VR goggles, we also have some good news for you: the whole game supports VR mode, so you can play the way you like best.

The premiere in 2022, more details will be announced soon. Follow our channels and announcements to stay up to date and see how Best Forklift Operator is developing:

💬【𝙳𝙸𝚂𝙲𝙾𝚁𝙳】https://discord.gg/ZUQfuxgjru
📰【𝙵𝙰𝙲𝙴𝙱𝙾𝙾𝙺】https://www.facebook.com/Gamedust 
🦆【𝚃𝚆𝙸𝚃𝚃𝙴𝚁】https://twitter.com/GamedustTT 
🕹️【𝚂𝚃𝙴𝙰𝙼】https://store.steampowered.com/franchise/GameDust
📷【𝙸𝙽𝚂𝚃𝙰𝙶𝚁𝙰𝙼】https://www.instagram.com/gamedust_studio/
